description:
Take a tour, or head out for a sunset paddle. The Eleven Six's displacement hull tracks superbly on flatwater or rivers, letting you put in more strokes on either side. Level 6 makes versatile boards with great stability and excellent overall performance for beginner to advanced paddlers. This shorter version is best suited to paddlers in the 120-190lb. range who enjoy lake touring or fitness paddling.

  • Multi-layer epoxy and glass construction ensures durability and keeps it looking beautiful
  • Clear coat finish uses tri-layer fibreglass epoxy resin
  • Lightweight EPS foam core with 5-layer reinforced sidewalls
  • Deck pad makes touring days more comfortable
  • Ergonomic carry handle make the car-to-beach transition easier
  • Lots of lash points let you carry gear on deck for longer days or overnight missions
  • Modified race fin has a large surface area to increase lateral stability and improve tracking
  • Includes fin screw, fin plate and fin key
name: Level Six Eleven Six Touring V2 SUP
